Package pepse.world

package pepse.world
This package contains the classes that are used to represent the world in the simulation.

The classes in this package are:

  • Avatar - A class that creates the game Avatar.
  • Block - A class that creates a Block objects in the world.
  • Sky - A class that creates the Sky background in the world.
  • Terrain- A class that creates the ground in the world.
  • Actionable interface - A class that defines a special behavior.
  • UI package - A class that creates the display of energy in the world.
  • DayNight package - A class that creates the day/night cycle in the world.
  • Trees package - A class that creates the trees in the world.
  • Util package - A class that contains the utility classes used in the world.

The classes in this package are used to create the world and the objects in it.

Author:
Noam shabat, Samuel Hayat
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pepse
    This package contains the classes that are used to create the Pepse Game application.
    pepse.world.daynight
    This package deals with all that is related to the day / night like the sun or the creation of a fake night to imitate the real day.
    pepse.world.trees
    This package deals with all that is related to the objects in the game area.
    pepse.world.UI
    this class is responsible to display the energy of the avatar to the player
    pepse.util
    This package includes all kinds of useful tools for the game that are not directly in touch with the game but help for calculations and graphics.
  • Class
    Description
    Actionable
    Interface for GameObjects that can be actioned upon.
    Avatar
    A class that represents the avatar game object
    Block
    A class that represents a single block game object
    JumpObserver
    A class that represents a jump observer object.
    Sky
    Utility class for creating a sky object that spans the entire game window.
    Terrain
    Manages the creation and representation of game terrain, using Perlin noise for natural landscape generation.
